messages: Max consecutive errors reached. Hey, we can't win every time but we can try anyway!
That's 5 in a row! Even the best debuggers need a coffee break sometimes.
Five strikes and you're out! But in coding, we get infinite innings.
Well, that's enough of that particular error. Time to shake things up!
Error limit reached. Remember: every bug is just a feature waiting to be documented.
Five times the same mistake? You're consistent, I'll give you that!
Pausing before this becomes a habit. Let's try something different!
That's our error quota for today. Tomorrow's another chance to break things!
Five errors walked into a bar. The bartender said 'That's enough for now.'
Maximum errors achieved! You've unlocked the 'Persistent' badge.
Houston, we've had five errors. Time to switch to plan B!
Error streak broken at 5! The crowd goes mild.
Five errors? That's just the universe's way of saying 'try harder.'
Congratulations! You've found a very reliable way to crash. Now let's find another way.
Error limit reached. But hey, at least you're thorough!
Five strikes! Even Lua is suggesting we take a breather here.
That's enough errors to fill a small bug report. Let's reload and retry!
Maximum consecutive fails reached. Plot twist: this is character building.
Five errors later... still here, still trying. That's the spirit!
Error threshold exceeded. Time to put on our debugging hat!
Well, we've established what doesn't work. Progress!
Five errors is just five opportunities to learn. Very efficient!
Pausing at 5. Because 6 would just be showing off.
Error count maxed out! Somewhere, a rubber duck is waiting to help debug this.
Five consecutive errors! You're nothing if not dedicated to the cause.
That's the limit! Even Stormworks needs a moment to process this.
Maximum errors reached. Remember: it's not a bug, it's an unexpected feature!
Five in a row! Let's reload and show this error who's boss.
Error quota filled! Time to reset and approach from a fresh angle.
Five strikes achieved! The definition of insanity is... well, you know the rest.
Pausing simulation. Your code's persistence is admirable, if misguided.
Maximum error count! On the bright side, at least it's consistently broken.
Five errors deep. Time to surface for air and a reload!
That's our limit! Let's fix this and get back to making ships that actually work.
Error streak complete! Achievement unlocked: Determined Developer.
Five times! Your dedication to finding bugs is unmatched.
Maximum errors exceeded. But you know what? Tomorrow's another debug day!
Five errors walked into a function. None of them returned.
Pausing now. Even the best of us need a moment to regroup!
